welcome_message_body: "Welcome to North Cornwall, where the charming coastal towns and stunning beaches await you! Known for its breathtaking beauty and rich history, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city and embrace all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lancaster Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lancaster Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Harrisburg International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Capital City Terminal
terminals.description: The Capital City Terminal at Harrisburg International Airport serves regional flights to nearby cities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at York Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for handling cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
